page.User 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

from knitter.webelement import WebElement
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By


[文档]class UserList():

[文档]    class UserItem(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//span[@class='pop-user-list-item-user-display-name' and text()='#@UserName']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def VerifyUserExistence(self, userName, TrueOrFlase = True):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@UserName', userName)
            super(UserList.UserItem, self).VerifyExistence(TrueOrFlase)



[文档]        def Click(self, userName):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@UserName', userName)
            super(UserList.UserItem, self).Click()



[文档]    class UserListCount(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//li[contains(@class,'pop-manage-list-item pop-user-list-item')]")

    (by, value) = (By.CLASS_NAME, "pop-manage-list-title-action-item")

[文档]class UserDataScopeList():

[文档]    class UserDataScopeItem(WebElement):
        (by, value) = (By.XPATH, "//label[contains(@class,'pop-user-detail-customer-subcheck-block-item-label') and text() = '#@Name']")

        def __init__(self):
            by = WebElement.by
            value = WebElement.value


[文档]        def Click(self, name):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            super(UserDataScopeList.UserDataScopeItem, self).Click()



[文档]        def VerifyVisible(self, name, TrueOrFalse=True):
            self.value = self.value.replace('#@Name', name)
            super(UserDataScopeList.UserDataScopeItem, self).VerifyVisible(TrueOrFalse)
